definition: younger female cousin via female line
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
husband of younger female cousin via female line

sentences.english: But I will no longer importune my young cousin.
sentences.chinese: 可是我也不願意委曲我那年輕的表妹。

sentences.english: When I was young, we had a cousin in a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 我年輕的時候，我們有一個坐輪椅的表妹在。

sentences.english: My cousin was born in China and grew up in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 我的表妹出生在中國，在澳大利亞長大。

sentences.english: Black temporarily at cousin and good li-li jins asylum.
sentences.chinese: “黑皮”暫時在表妹和相好的金莉莉家避難。

sentences.english: Jesse married his own first cousin after a nine-year courtship.
sentences.chinese: 傑西在和自己的表妹約會九年之後結婚。

sentences.english: In my family in 2000, my cousin wouldn't have a baby for another four years.
sentences.chinese: 2000年，我的表妹在四年後又生了個小孩。

sentences.english: And it was my first time to see the Aquarium of the Bay in San Francisco with my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 這是我來舊金山，第一次跟表妹去當地的海洋館。

sentences.english: A few days later, Halloween night, Holly's cousin is staying over.
sentences.chinese: 幾天後，萬聖節前夕夜晚，荷莉的表妹來過夜。

sentences.english: That made my cousin almost start to cry but we calmed him down.
sentences.chinese: 這時表妹幾乎想要哭出來，可我們使她鎮靜了下來。

sentences.english: Does your cousin want to join the art club?
sentences.chinese: 你表妹想參加藝術俱樂部嗎？

sentences.english: That afternoon aboard the train, the cousins settled down in their seats.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午表妹倆才登上火車落了座。

sentences.english: Do not make yourself uneasy, my dear cousin, about your apparel.
sentences.chinese: 不要爲衣裝擔心思，親愛的表妹。

sentences.english: Small Boy eats rice with soup and fights for the steam chicken with Small Girl.
sentences.chinese: 粗眉仔用雞湯撈飯，仲同表妹搶蒸雞食。

sentences.english: The patriarch Jacob married two of his first cousins, Rachel and Leah.
sentences.chinese: 各布娶了他的兩個表妹雷切兒和莉爾。

sentences.english: Cousins introduced her new toys and pearl milk tea.
sentences.chinese: 表妹介紹她的新玩具和珍珠奶茶。

sentences.english: My little cousin, Maggie, opened the door.
sentences.chinese: 我的小表妹麥吉打開了門。
